Name: Scrapvival
About the game: Scrapvival is a survival game where you as a solo player or with help of your friends (up to 4 players in one lobby) are on the abandoned scrapyard where you have to start the 4 generators from which you can gather required parts to build the scrap helicopter and escape the evil robots that are trying to kill you from the moment you step inside their territory. Will you win, chicken out or lose? That's up to you!

Meta Description: Looking for information on Scrapvival? Check out the release date (Nov 22, 2021), developer insights from Matus Pavkeje, and a complete game summary.
